Type.Name: EngineLang

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EngineLang extends GLib.Opaque

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.remarks: The is implemented by engines that customize the rendering-system independent part of the Pango pipeline for a particular script or language. For instance, a custom could be provided for Thai to implement the dictionary-based word boundary lookups needed for that language.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int raw) cil managed

Docs.remarks: This is an internal constructor, and should not be used by user code.
